questions.question: What is the basic economic problem that arises due to scarcity of resources?

answers.a: How to produce goods and services
answers.b: How to distribute goods and services
answers.c: What goods and services to produce
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: Which of the following is a central problem of an economy?

answers.a: What goods and services to produce
answers.b: How to produce goods and services
answers.c: For whom to produce goods and services
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: What does the production possibilities curve (PPC) show?

answers.a: The various combinations of two commodities that can be produced with given resources
answers.b: The various combinations of two commodities that can be consumed with given resources
answers.c: The various combinations of two commodities that can be produced with latest technology
answers.d: The various combinations of two commodities that can be consumed with latest technology

questions.question: What is the primary objective of a firm?

answers.a: To maximize profits
answers.b: To maximize sales revenue
answers.c: To maximize growth rate
answers.d: To maximize consumer satisfaction

questions.question: What is the want-satisfying capacity of a commodity known as?

answers.a: Utility
answers.b: Usefulness
answers.c: Satisfaction
answers.d: Pleasure

questions.question: What happens to the marginal utility of a commodity as the consumer consumes more and more units of it?

answers.a: It increases
answers.b: It decreases
answers.c: It remains constant
answers.d: It becomes zero

questions.question: Which of the following is a determinant of demand?

answers.a: Price of the commodity
answers.b: Price of related goods
answers.c: Income of the buyer
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: What is the law of demand?

answers.a: The quantity demanded of a commodity increases with an increase in its price
answers.b: The quantity demanded of a commodity decreases with an increase in its price
answers.c: The quantity demanded of a commodity remains constant with a change in its price
answers.d: The quantity demanded of a commodity is unrelated to its price

questions.question: What is the elasticity of demand?

answers.a: The responsiveness of the quantity demanded of a commodity to a change in its price
answers.b: The responsiveness of the quantity supplied of a commodity to a change in its price
answers.c: The responsiveness of the quantity demanded of a commodity to a change in the price of a related good
answers.d: The responsiveness of the quantity supplied of a commodity to a change in the price of a related good

questions.question: What is the supply of a commodity?

answers.a: The quantity of the commodity that sellers are willing to sell at a given price
answers.b: The quantity of the commodity that buyers are willing to buy at a given price
answers.c: The quantity of the commodity that is available in the market
answers.d: The quantity of the commodity that is produced

questions.question: What is the law of supply?

answers.a: The quantity supplied of a commodity increases with an increase in its price
answers.b: The quantity supplied of a commodity decreases with an increase in its price
answers.c: The quantity supplied of a commodity remains constant with a change in its price
answers.d: The quantity supplied of a commodity is unrelated to its price

questions.question: What is the equilibrium price of a commodity?

answers.a: The price at which the quantity demanded equals the quantity supplied
answers.b: The price at which the quantity demanded is greater than the quantity supplied
answers.c: The price at which the quantity demanded is less than the quantity supplied
answers.d: The price at which the quantity demanded is unrelated to the quantity supplied

questions.question: What happens to the equilibrium price and quantity of a commodity when there is an increase in demand?

answers.a: The equilibrium price and quantity both increase
answers.b: The equilibrium price and quantity both decrease
answers.c: The equilibrium price increases and the equilibrium quantity decreases
answers.d: The equilibrium price decreases and the equilibrium quantity increases

questions.question: What is the consumer surplus?

answers.a: The difference between the maximum price a consumer is willing to pay and the market price
answers.b: The difference between the market price and the minimum price a consumer is willing to pay
answers.c: The difference between the maximum price a consumer is willing to pay and the minimum price a consumer is willing to pay
answers.d: The difference between the market price and the minimum price a producer is willing to accept

questions.question: What is the deadweight loss of taxation?

answers.a: The loss of economic efficiency due to taxation
answers.b: The gain of economic efficiency due to taxation
answers.c: The loss of economic efficiency due to lack of taxation
answers.d: The gain of economic efficiency due to lack of taxation

questions.question: Which topic is most relevant to portions page?

answers.a: Scarcity and choice
answers.b: Basic economic problems
answers.c: PPC
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: What is the most important concept in portions page?

answers.a: Scarcity
answers.b: Choice
answers.c: PPC
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept in portions page?

answers.a: Opportunity cost
answers.b: Production possibility curve
answers.c: Scarcity
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: What is the relationship between scarcity and choice?

answers.a: Scarcity leads to choice
answers.b: Choice leads to scarcity
answers.c: Scarcity and choice are unrelated
answers.d: Scarcity and choice are mutually exclusive

questions.question: What is the significance of PPC in portions page?

answers.a: It shows the various combinations of two commodities that can be produced
answers.b: It shows the various combinations of two commodities that can be consumed
answers.c: It shows the relationship between scarcity and choice
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: What is the most important concept in portions page related to firms and their objectives?

answers.a: Profit maximization
answers.b: Sales revenue maximization
answers.c: Growth rate maximization
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: What is the relationship between utility and usefulness?

answers.a: Utility and usefulness are the same
answers.b: Utility and usefulness are different
answers.c: Utility is a part of usefulness
answers.d: Usefulness is a part of utility

questions.question: What is the law of diminishing marginal utility?

answers.a: The marginal utility of a commodity decreases as the consumer consumes more and more units of it
answers.b: The marginal utility of a commodity increases as the consumer consumes more and more units of it
answers.c: The marginal utility of a commodity remains constant as the consumer consumes more and more units of it
answers.d: The marginal utility of a commodity is unrelated to the quantity consumed

questions.question: What is the relationship between demand and supply?

answers.a: Demand and supply are unrelated
answers.b: Demand and supply are inversely related
answers.c: Demand and supply are directly related
answers.d: Demand and supply are mutually exclusive

questions.question: What is the equilibrium price and quantity of a commodity?

answers.a: The price and quantity at which the quantity demanded equals the quantity supplied
answers.b: The price and quantity at which the quantity demanded is greater than the quantity supplied
answers.c: The price and quantity at which the quantity demanded is less than the quantity supplied
answers.d: The price and quantity at which the quantity demanded is unrelated to the quantity supplied

questions.question: What is the deadweight loss of taxation?

answers.a: The loss of economic efficiency due to taxation
answers.b: The gain of economic efficiency due to taxation
answers.c: The loss of economic efficiency due to lack of taxation
answers.d: The gain of economic efficiency due to lack of taxation

questions.question: Which topic is most relevant to portions page related to taxation and deadweight loss?

answers.a: Taxation
answers.b: Deadweight loss
answers.c: Economic efficiency
answers.d: All of the above

questions.question: What is the significance of portions page in understanding economics?

answers.a: It helps to understand the basic economic problems
answers.b: It helps to understand the production possibility curve
answers.c: It helps to understand the relationship between scarcity and choice
answers.d: All of the above
